p: Several compounds have been used for the preparation and construction of A. factorovskyi extract and nanoparticles. The 99.9% Ethanol and AgNO 3 were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Sigma-Aldrich Chemie GmbH, Taufkirchen, Germany). The Mueller Hinton Agar, Potato Dextrose Agar, Fluconazole, and the antimicrobial susceptibility disks (Tetracycline) were purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA).
